trans-unit.source: The function uses scipy.optimize for finding the value that satisfies the power equation. It first uses brentq with a prior search for bounds. If this fails to find a root, fsolve is used. If fsolve also fails, then, for alpha, power and effect_size, brentq with fixed bounds is used. However, there can still be cases where this fails.
trans-unit.target: 该函数使用scipy.optimize查找满足幂方程的值。它首先使用 brentq 进行边界搜索。如果找不到根目录，则使用 fsolve 。如果 fsolve 也失败，则对于 alpha ， power 和 effect_size ， brentq 具有固定范围的brentq。但是，仍然有一些失败的情况。

trans-unit.source: The method ‘BD2’ checks for each curve whether it lies completely inside bands constructed from two curves. All permutations of two curves in the set of curves are used, and the band depth is normalized to one. Due to the complete curve having to fall within the band, this method yields a lot of ties.
trans-unit.target: 方法“ BD2”检查每个曲线是否完全位于由两个曲线构成的带内。使用曲线集中的两个曲线的所有置换，并且将带深度归一化。由于完整的曲线必须落在频带内，因此该方法产生了很多联系。

trans-unit.source: The method ‘MBD’ is similar to ‘BD2’, but checks the fraction of the curve falling within the bands. It therefore generates very few ties.
trans-unit.target: 方法“ MBD”类似于“ BD2”，但是检查落在频带内的曲线的分数。因此，它产生的联系很少。

trans-unit.source: The method is based on the approach used in SAS, documented here:

trans-unit.source: The methods described here are mainly for two-way tables. Multi-way tables can be analyzed using log-linear models. Statsmodels does not currently have a dedicated API for loglinear modeling, but Poisson regression in statsmodels.genmod.GLM can be used for this purpose.

trans-unit.target: 我们感兴趣的模型有一个非负整数向量作为因变量（ los ），以及5个回归变量： Intercept ， type2 ， type3 ， hmo ， white 。

trans-unit.source: The models in this category have been checked for basic cases, but might be more exposed to numerical problems than the complete implementation. For example, count.Poisson has been added using only the generic maximum likelihood framework, the standard errors are based on the numerical evaluation of the Hessian, while discretemod.Poisson uses analytical Gradients and Hessian and will be more precise, especially in cases when there is strong multicollinearity. On the other hand, by subclassing GenericLikelihoodModel, it is easy to add new models, another example can be seen in the zero inflated Poisson model, miscmodels.count.
trans-unit.target: 这一类的模型已经对基本情况进行了检查,但可能比完整的实现更容易暴露在数值问题上。例如,count.Poisson只使用通用最大似然框架添加了标准误差,标准误差是基于Hessian的数值评估,而d discretemod.Poisson使用分析Gradients和Hessian,会更精确,特别是在有强烈的多线性的情况下。另一方面,通过对GenericLikelihoodModel的子类化,很容易增加新的模型,另一个例子可以看到零膨胀的Poisson模型,miscmodels.count。

trans-unit.source: The most important reason we need to specify a new update method is because we have three new parameters that we need to place into the state space formulation. In particular we let the parent DynamicFactor.update class handle placing all the parameters except the three new ones in to the state space representation, and then we put the last three in manually.
trans-unit.target: 我们需要指定一种新的 update 方法的最重要原因是，我们需要将三个新参数放入状态空间公式中。特别是，我们让父级 DynamicFactor.update 类处理将除三个新参数之外的所有参数放入状态空间表示中，然后手动将最后三个参数放入。

trans-unit.source: The name ‘cox_snell’ is idiosyncratic and is simply used for convenience following the approach suggested in Cox and Snell (1968). Further note that \(cox\_snell(x) = \frac{3}{2}*x^{2/3} * hyp2f1(2/3.,1/3.,5/3.,x)\) where hyp2f1 is the hypergeometric 2f1 function. The Anscombe residuals are sometimes defined in the literature using the hyp2f1 formulation. Both betainc and hyp2f1 can be found in scipy.
trans-unit.target: 名称“ cox_snell”是特质的，为了方便起见，仅按照Cox和Snell（1968）建议的方法使用。进一步注意\（cox \ _snell（x）= \ frac {3} {2} * x ^ {2/3} * hyp2f1（2 / 3.，1 / 3.，5 / 3.，x）\）其中hyp2f1是超几何2f1函数。Anscombe残差有时在文献中使用hyp2f1公式定义。betainc和hyp2f1都可以在scipy中找到。

trans-unit.source: The new part of this model is that there is allowed to be a annual seasonal effect (it is annual even though the periodicity is 4 because the dataset is quarterly). The second difference is that this model uses the log of the data rather than the level.
trans-unit.target: 这个模型的新部分是允许有年度季节性效应(虽然周期性是4,但因为数据集是季度性的,所以是年度性的)。第二个区别是这个模型使用数据的对数而不是水平。

trans-unit.source: The next \(m^2 imes p\) parameters are used to create the p coefficient matrices for the vector autoregression describing the factor transition. They are transformed in transform_params to enforce stationarity of the VAR(p). They are placed so as to make the transition matrix a companion matrix for the VAR. In particular, we assume that the first \(m^2\) parameters fill the first coefficient matrix (starting at [0,0] and filling along rows), the second \(m^2\) parameters fill the second matrix, etc.
trans-unit.target: 接下来的\（m ^ 2 imes p \）参数用于为描述因子转换的矢量自回归创建 p 系数矩阵。它们在transform_params中进行 transform_params 以增强VAR（p）的平稳性。放置它们是为了使过渡矩阵成为VAR的伴随矩阵。特别是，我们假设第一个\（m ^ 2 \）参数填充第一个系数矩阵（从[0,0]开始并沿行填充），第二个\（m ^ 2 \）参数填充第二个矩阵，等等

trans-unit.source: The next \(n\) parameters provide variances for the error_cov errors in the observation equation. They fill in the diagonal of the observation covariance matrix, and are constrained to be positive by transofrm_params.
trans-unit.target: 下一个\（n \）参数为观察方程式中的error_cov错误提供方差。它们填充观察协方差矩阵的对角线，并且被 transofrm_params 约束为正。

trans-unit.source: The notation for the state-space form follows Durbin and Koopman (2001).
trans-unit.target: 状态空间形式的符号遵循Durbin和Koopman(2001)。

trans-unit.source: The null hypothesis for all four test is that the coefficients corresponding to past values of the second time series are zero.
trans-unit.target: 四个检验的零假设都是:第二个时间序列的过去值对应的系数为零。

trans-unit.source: The null hypothesis is no cointegration. Variables in y0 and y1 are assumed to be integrated of order 1, I(1).
trans-unit.target: 零点假设为无协整。假设y0和y1中的变量积分为1阶,I(1)。

trans-unit.source: The null hypothesis is of no heteroskedasticity. That means different things depending on which alternative is selected:
trans-unit.target: 零假设是没有异方差性。这意味着不同的事情,取决于选择哪种选择。

trans-unit.source: The null hypothesis of the Augmented Dickey-Fuller is that there is a unit root, with the alternative that there is no unit root. If the pvalue is above a critical size, then we cannot reject that there is a unit root.
trans-unit.target: Augmented Dickey-Fuller的零假设是存在单位根,备选方案是不存在单位根。如果p值超过临界大小,那么我们就不能拒绝存在单位根的说法。

trans-unit.source: The null hypothesis of the test is that there is no serial correlation. The Durbin-Watson test statistics is defined as:
trans-unit.target: 检验的零假设是:不存在序列相关。Durbin-Watson检验统计量定义为:

trans-unit.source: The null hypothesis of the test statistic is for an independent and identically distributed (i.i.d.) time series, and an unspecified alternative hypothesis.
trans-unit.target: 检验统计的零假设为独立且同分布(i.i.d.)的时间序列,以及未指定的替代假设。

trans-unit.target: 观察到的Z值包括空值和非空值。空值Z值的拟合分布是高斯分布,但可能有非零平均值和/或非单位比例。

trans-unit.target: 一维搜索k的最优值是不凸的,所以可以得到局部最小值。

trans-unit.source: The only additional parameters to be estimated via MLE are the variances of any included stochastic components.
trans-unit.target: 通过MLE估计的唯一额外参数是任何包含的随机成分的方差。

trans-unit.source: The only currently known case is a perfect fit in robust linear model estimation. For RLM, if residuals are equal to zero, then it does not cause an exception, but having this perfect fit can produce NaNs in some results (scale=0 and 0/0 division) (issue #55).
trans-unit.target: 目前唯一已知的情况是鲁棒线性模型估计中的完美拟合。对于RLM来说,如果残差等于零,那么不会引起异常,但有这种完美拟合,在某些结果中会产生NaNs(scale=0和0/0除法)(问题#55)。

trans-unit.source: The optimizer selects possibly parameter values in an unconstrained way. That's not usually desired (since variances can't be negative, for example), and transform_params is used to transform the unconstrained values used by the optimizer to constrained values appropriate to the model. Variances terms are typically squared (to force them to be positive), and AR lag coefficients are often constrained to lead to a stationary model. untransform_params is used for the reverse operation (and is important because starting parameters are usually specified in terms of values appropriate to the model, and we need to convert them to parameters appropriate to the optimizer before we can begin the optimization routine).
trans-unit.target: 优化器以不受限制的方式选择可能的参数值。这通常是不希望的（例如，因为方差不能为负），并且 transform_params 用于将优化程序使用的非约束值转换为适合模型的约束值。方差项通常是平方的（以使其为正），并且AR滞后系数通常受到约束以导致平稳模型。 untransform_params 用于反向操作（这很重要，因为起始参数通常是根据适合模型的值指定的，并且在开始优化例程之前，我们需要将它们转换为适合优化器的参数）。

trans-unit.source: The orders of each of the polynomials in the model.
trans-unit.target: 模型中每个多项式的阶数。

trans-unit.source: The output of each of these models is an estimate of the trend component $\mu_t$ and an estimate of the cyclical component $\eta_t$. Qualitatively the estimates of trend and cycle are very similar, although the trend component from the HP filter is somewhat more variable than those from the unobserved components models. This means that relatively mode of the movement in the unemployment rate is attributed to changes in the underlying trend rather than to temporary cyclical movements.
trans-unit.target: 每个模型的输出都是对趋势成分$/mu_t$的估计和对周期成分$/eta_t$的估计。从质量上看,趋势和周期的估计非常相似,尽管来自HP过滤器的趋势分量比来自未观察到的分量模型的趋势分量变化更大一些。这意味着,失业率变动的相对模式是归因于基本趋势的变化,而不是暂时的周期性变动。

trans-unit.source: The overall log-density: log p(y, fe, vc, vcp).
trans-unit.target: 总体对数密度:对数p(y,fe,vc,vcp)。

trans-unit.source: The p x p normalized covariance of the design / exogenous data. This is approximately equal to (X.T X)^(-1)
trans-unit.target: 设计/外生数据的p×p归一化协方差。这大约等于(X.T X)^(-1)

trans-unit.source: The p-value corresponding to the test statistic.
trans-unit.target: 检验统计量对应的p值。

trans-unit.source: The p-value for M is calculated using the binomial distrubution and can be intrepreted the same as for a t-test. The test-statistic is distributed Binom(min(N(+), N(-)), n_trials, .5) where n_trials equals N(+) + N(-).
trans-unit.target: M的p值是用二项式分布计算的,可以和t检验一样解释。检验统计量分布为Binom(min(N(+),N(-)),n_trials,.5),其中n_trials等于N(+)+N(-)。

trans-unit.source: The p-value is based on the chi-square distribution which requires that the sample size is not very small to be a good approximation of the true distribution. For 2x2 contingency tables the exact distribution can be obtained with mcnemar
trans-unit.target: p值基于卡方分布，该分布要求样本大小不是很小，才能很好地逼近真实分布。对于2x2列联表，可以使用 mcnemar 获得确切的分布

trans-unit.source: The p-values are obtained through regression surface approximation from MacKinnon 1994, but using the updated 2010 tables. If the p-value is close to significant, then the critical values should be used to judge whether to reject the null.
trans-unit.target: p值是通过MacKinnon 1994年的回归面近似得到的,但使用的是2010年更新的表格。如果p值接近显著,则应使用临界值来判断是否拒绝零值。

trans-unit.source: The parameter $\lambda_c$ (the frequency of the cycle) is an additional parameter to be estimated by MLE. If the seasonal effect is stochastic, then there is one another parameter to estimate (the variance of the error term - note that both of the error terms here share the same variance, but are assumed to have independent draws).
trans-unit.target: 参数$\lambda_c$(周期的频率)是MLE要估计的一个附加参数。如果季节效应是随机的,那么还有一个参数需要估计(误差项的方差--注意这里的两个误差项都有相同的方差,但假设有独立的抽样)。

trans-unit.source: The parameter X is \(X\beta\) in the above formula.
trans-unit.target: 上式中的参数 X 为\（X \ beta \）。

trans-unit.source: The parameter X is \(x_{i}\beta\) in the above formula.
trans-unit.target: 上式中的参数 X 为\（x_ {i} \ beta \）。

trans-unit.source: The parameter \(\lambda_c\) (the frequency of the cycle) is an additional parameter to be estimated by MLE.
trans-unit.target: 参数\(\lambda_c)(周期频率)是由MLE估计的一个附加参数。

trans-unit.target: 部分自相关函数。

trans-unit.target: 罚分是 elastic net 罚分，是L1和L2罚分的组合。

trans-unit.source: The periodicity (number of “seasons” in a “year”) is s and the number of harmonics is h. Note that h is configurable to be less than s/2, but s/2 harmonics is sufficient to fully model all seasonal variations of periodicity s. Like the time domain seasonal term (cf. Seasonal section, above), the inclusion of the error terms allows for the seasonal effects to vary over time. The argument stochastic_freq_seasonal can be used to set one or more of the seasonal components of this type to be non-random, meaning they will not vary over time.
trans-unit.target: 周期性（“年”中的“季节”数）为s，谐波数为h。请注意，h可配置为小于s / 2，但是s / 2谐波足以完全模拟周期s的所有季节性变化。像时域季节性项（参见上面的“季节性”部分）一样，包含误差项可以使季节性影响随时间变化。可以使用stochastic_freq_seasonal参数将这种类型的一个或多个季节性成分设置为非随机，这意味着它们不会随时间变化。

trans-unit.source: The periodicity (number of seasons) is s, and the defining character is that (without the error term), the seasonal components sum to zero across one complete cycle. The inclusion of an error term allows the seasonal effects to vary over time.
trans-unit.target: 周期性（季节数）为 s ，其定义特征是（无误差项），整个一个完整周期中的季节性分量总和为零。包含误差项可以使季节性影响随时间变化。

trans-unit.source: The periodicity (number of seasons) is s, and the defining character is that (without the error term), the seasonal components sum to zero across one complete cycle. The inclusion of an error term allows the seasonal effects to vary over time (if this is not desired, \(\sigma_\omega^2\) can be set to zero using the stochastic_seasonal=False keyword argument).
trans-unit.target: 周期性（季节数）为s，并且定义性为（无误差项），整个一个完整周期中的季节分量总和为零。包含误差项可以使季节性影响随时间变化（如果不需要，可以使用 stochastic_seasonal=False 关键字参数将\（\ sigma_ \ omega ^ 2 \）设置为零）。

This function can be used for quickly checking modeling assumptions with respect to a single regressor.

trans-unit.source: The quantity theory of money suggests that "a given change in the rate of change in the quantity of money induces ... an equal change in the rate of price inflation" (Lucas, 1980). Following Lucas, we examine the relationship between double-sided exponentially weighted moving averages of money growth and CPI inflation. Although Lucas found the relationship between these variables to be stable, more recently it appears that the relationship is unstable; see e.g. Sargent and Surico (2010).
trans-unit.target: 货币数量理论认为,"货币数量变化率的特定变化会引起......价格通货膨胀率的同等变化"(Lucas,1980)。按照卢卡斯的观点,我们考察货币增长的双面指数加权移动平均数与CPI通胀率之间的关系。虽然Lucas发现这些变量之间的关系是稳定的,但最近看来,这种关系是不稳定的;例如见Sargent和Surico(2010)。

trans-unit.source: The returned corrected p-values are from the last stage of the fdr_bh linear step-up procedure (fdrcorrection0 with method=’indep’) corrected for the estimated fraction of true hypotheses. This means that the rejection decision can be obtained with pval_corrected <= alpha, where alpha is the origianal significance level. (Note: This has changed from earlier versions (<0.5.0) of statsmodels.)
trans-unit.target: 返回的校正后的p值来自fdr_bh线性升压程序的最后阶段（方法为'indep'的fdrcorrection0），针对真实假设的估计分数进行了校正。这意味着可以使用 pval_corrected <= alpha 来获得拒绝决策，其中 alpha 是原始重要性级别。（注意：这与statsmodels的早期版本（<0.5.0）已更改。）

trans-unit.target: 摘要是一个包含唯一事件时间、估计生存函数值和相关数量的数据框。

trans-unit.source: The survival function S(t) = P(T > t) is the probability that an event time T is greater than t.
trans-unit.target: 生存函数S（t）= P（T> t）是事件时间T大于t的概率。

trans-unit.source: The t distribution is the standard t distribution and not a standardized t distribution, which means that the scale parameter is not equal to the standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: t分布是标准t分布,而不是标准化t分布,也就是说比例参数不等于标准差。

trans-unit.source: The test rejects if the 2*alpha confidence interval for the difference is contained in the (low, upp) interval.
trans-unit.target: 如果 (low, upp) 间隔中包含差异的2 * alpha置信区间，则测试将拒绝。

trans-unit.source: The test statistic is approximately equal to 2*(1-r) where r is the sample autocorrelation of the residuals. Thus, for r == 0, indicating no serial correlation, the test statistic equals 2. This statistic will always be between 0 and 4. The closer to 0 the statistic, the more evidence for positive serial correlation. The closer to 4, the more evidence for negative serial correlation.
trans-unit.target: 测试统计量大约等于2 *（1-r），其中 r 是残差的样本自相关。因此，对于r == 0，表示无序列相关，则检验统计量等于2。该统计量将始终在0和4之间。统计值越接近0，则表明正序列相关性越强。越接近4，负序列相关性越强的证据。

trans-unit.source: The time frame in the original paper varied across series, but was broadly 1954-1989. Below we use data from the period 1948-2008 for all series. Although the unobserved components approach allows isolating a seasonal component within the model, the series considered in the paper, and here, are already seasonally adjusted.

trans-unit.source: The variance components are estimated using least squares regression of the products r*r’, for standardized residuals r and r’ in the same group, on a vector of indicators defining which variance components are shared by r and r’.
trans-unit.target: 对于同一组中的标准化残差r和r'，使用乘积r * r'的最小二乘回归估计方差分量，该矢量在定义r和r'共享哪些方差分量的指标向量上。

trans-unit.source: The variance components formulas are processed separately for each group. If a variable is categorical the results will not be affected by whether the group labels are distinct or re-used over the top-level groups.

trans-unit.source: The variance inflation factor is a measure for the increase of the variance of the parameter estimates if an additional variable, given by exog_idx is added to the linear regression. It is a measure for multicollinearity of the design matrix, exog.
trans-unit.target: 方差膨胀系数是衡量在线性回归中增加一个由exog_idx给出的额外变量时,参数估计值的方差增加。它是衡量设计矩阵exog的多共线性的一个指标。

trans-unit.source: These are longitudinal data from a factorial experiment. The outcome variable is the weight of each pig, and the only predictor variable we will use here is "time". First we fit a model that expresses the mean weight as a linear function of time, with a random intercept for each pig. The model is specified using formulas. Since the random effects structure is not specified, the default random effects structure (a random intercept for each group) is automatically used.
trans-unit.target: 这些是因子实验的纵向数据。结果变量是每头猪的体重,我们在这里要使用的唯一预测变量是 "时间"。首先,我们拟合一个模型,将平均体重表示为时间的线性函数,每头猪的随机截距。该模型是用公式来指定的。由于没有指定随机效应结构,所以自动使用默认的随机效应结构(每组的随机截距)。

trans-unit.source: These are shorthand for endogenous and exogenous variables. You might be more comfortable with the common y and X notation in linear models. Sometimes the endogenous variable y is called a dependent variable. Likewise, sometimes the exogenous variables X are called the independent variables. You can read about this in greater detail at endog, exog, what’s that?
trans-unit.target: 这些是内生和外生变量的简写。您可能更喜欢线性模型中常见的 y 和 X 表示法。有时将内生变量 y 称为因变量。同样，有时将外生变量 X 称为自变量。您可以在endog，exog上详细了解此内容，那是什么？

trans-unit.source: These measures try to identify observations that are outliers, with large residual, or observations that have a large influence on the regression estimates. Robust Regression, RLM, can be used to both estimate in an outlier robust way as well as identify outlier. The advantage of RLM that the estimation results are not strongly influenced even if there are many outliers, while most of the other measures are better in identifying individual outliers and might not be able to identify groups of outliers.
trans-unit.target: 这些措施试图识别出那些离群值、残差较大的观测值,或者对回归估计值影响较大的观测值。Robust Regression,即RLM,既可以用离群值稳健的方式进行估计,也可以用来识别离群值。RLM的优点是,即使存在很多离群值,估计结果也不会受到很大影响,而其他大多数措施在识别单个离群值方面效果较好,可能无法识别离群值群体。

trans-unit.source: This class Implements the knockoff method of Barber and Candes. This is an approach for controlling the FDR of a variety of regression estimation procedures, including correlation coefficients, OLS regression, OLS with forward selection, and LASSO regression.
trans-unit.target: 该类实现了Barber和Candes的敲除法。这是一种用于控制各种回归估计程序的FDR的方法,包括相关系数、OLS回归、正向选择的OLS和LASSO回归。

trans-unit.source: This class allows two different underlying representations of ARMA models as state space models: that of Hamilton and that of Harvey. Both are equivalent in the sense that they are analytical representations of the ARMA model, but the state vectors of each have different meanings. For this reason, maximum likelihood does not result in identical parameter estimates and even the same set of parameters will result in different loglikelihoods.
trans-unit.target: 该类允许将ARMA模型作为状态空间模型的两种不同的基本表示法:Hamilton的表示法和Harvey的表示法。两者在意义上是等价的,它们都是ARMA模型的分析表示,但各自的状态向量具有不同的意义。为此,最大似然并不能得到相同的参数估计,即使是同一组参数也会得到不同的对数似然。

trans-unit.source: This class uses numerical differences to obtain the derivative of the objective function. If the jacobian of the conditional mean function, func is available, then it can be used by subclassing this class and defining a method jac_func.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用数值差来获取目标函数的导数。如果条件均值函数 func 的jacobian 可用，则可以通过子类化此类并定义方法 jac_func 来使用它。

trans-unit.source: This class wraps the state space model with Kalman filtering to add in functionality for maximum likelihood estimation. In particular, it adds the concept of updating the state space representation based on a defined set of parameters, through the update method or updater attribute (see below for more details on which to use when), and it adds a fit method which uses a numerical optimizer to select the parameters that maximize the likelihood of the model.
trans-unit.target: 此类使用卡尔曼滤波包装状态空间模型，以添加用于最大似然估计的功能。特别是，它增加了更新基于定义的参数集合的状态空间，通过所述的概念 update 方法或 updater 属性（见下文关于其详情时使用），它增加了一个 fit 其使用方法数值优化器来选择使模型的可能性最大化的参数。

trans-unit.source: This component results in one parameter to be fitted using maximum likelihood: \(\sigma_{\omega^2}\), and up to two parameters to be chosen, the number of seasons s and optionally the number of harmonics h, with \(1 \leq h \leq \floor(s/2)\).
trans-unit.target: 这一部分的结果是用最大似然法拟合一个参数。\((sigma_{/omega^2}/),最多选择两个参数,即季节数s和可选的谐波数h,与(1/leq h/leq floor(s/2)/)。

trans-unit.source: This component results in one parameter to be selected via maximum likelihood: \(\sigma_\omega^2\), and one parameter to be chosen, the number of seasons s.
trans-unit.target: 该分量导致通过最大似然来选择一个参数：\（\ sigma_ \ omega ^ 2 \），并选择一个参数，即季节数 s 。

trans-unit.source: This computes joined Wald tests for the hypothesis that all coefficients corresponding to a term are zero.
trans-unit.target: 它用于计算加入瓦尔德试验假设，即对应于所有系数 term 均为零。

trans-unit.source: This contains several goodness-of-fit tests as special cases, see the describtion of lambd, the exponent of the power discrepancy. The pvalue is based on the asymptotic chi-square distribution of the test statistic.
trans-unit.target: 这里面包含了几个拟合度检验的特殊情况,见lambd的描述,幂差的指数。p值是基于检验统计量的渐进式齐次方分布。

trans-unit.source: This converts the covariance matrix to a correlation matrix. Then, finds the nearest correlation matrix that is positive semidefinite and converts it back to a covariance matrix using the initial standard deviation.
trans-unit.target: 这将协方差矩阵转换为相关矩阵。然后,找到最接近的正半定义的相关矩阵,并利用初始标准差将其转换回协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to a parameterization that forces all the coefficients to sum to zero. Notice that the intercept here is the grand mean where the grand mean is the mean of means of the dependent variable by each level.
trans-unit.target: 这相当于一个参数化,强制所有系数之和为零。注意,这里的截距是大平均数,其中大平均数是各级因变量的平均数。

trans-unit.source: This correspons to a parameterization that forces all the coefficients to sum to zero. Notice that the intercept here is the grand mean where the grand mean is the mean of means of the dependent variable by each level.
trans-unit.target: 这对应的是一个参数化,强制所有系数之和为零。注意,这里的截距是大平均数,其中大平均数是各级因变量的平均数。

trans-unit.source: This covers Benjamini/Hochberg for independent or positively correlated and Benjamini/Yekutieli for general or negatively correlated tests. Both are available in the function multipletests, as method=`fdr_bh`, resp. fdr_by.
trans-unit.target: 这涵盖了独立或正相关的Benjamini / Hochberg，以及一般或负相关的Benjamini / Yekutieli。两者都可以在multipletests函数中使用，分别是method =`fdr_bh`。 fdr_by 。

trans-unit.source: This creates a set partition from a list of sets given as tuples. It tries to find the partition with the largest sets. That is, sets are included after being sorted by length.
trans-unit.target: 它从一个以元组形式给出的集合列表中创建一个集合分区。它试图找到具有最大集合的分区。也就是说,集合在按长度排序后被包含在内。

trans-unit.source: This creates one graph with the scatterplot of observed values compared to fitted values.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建一个观察值与拟合值比较的散点图。

trans-unit.source: This creates rankdata as it is used for non-parametric tests, where in the case of ties the average rank is assigned.
trans-unit.target: 这将创建rankdata,因为它用于非参数检验,在平局的情况下,平均等级被分配。

trans-unit.source: This currently merges tables with different number of columns. It is recommended to use as_latex_tabular directly on the individual tables.
trans-unit.target: 当前，这将合并具有不同列数的表。建议直接在各个表上使用 as_latex_tabular 。

trans-unit.source: This density estimator can handle univariate as well as multivariate data, including mixed continuous / ordered discrete / unordered discrete data. It also provides cross-validated bandwidth selection methods (least squares, maximum likelihood).
trans-unit.target: 该密度估计器可以处理单变量以及多变量数据,包括混合连续/有序离散/无序离散数据。它还提供了交叉验证的带宽选择方法(最小二乘法、最大似然法)。

trans-unit.source: This differs by an additive constant from the log posterior log p(fe, vc, vcp | y).
trans-unit.target: 这与对数后验对数p(fe,vc,vcp | y)有一个加法常数的区别。

trans-unit.source: This differs from the proportions_ztest because of the degrees of freedom correction: >>> sm.stats.proportions_ztest(15, 20.0, value=0.5) (2.5819888974716112, 0.009823274507519247).
trans-unit.target: 由于自由度校正，这不同于比例_ztest：>>> sm.stats.proportions_ztest（15，20.0，value = 0.5）（2.5819888974716112，0.009823274507519247）。

trans-unit.source: This document is based heavily on this excellent resource from UCLA.
trans-unit.target: 本文档主要基于UCLA的出色资源。

trans-unit.source: This document is based heavily on this excellent resource from UCLA http://www.ats.ucla.edu/stat/r/library/contrast_coding.htm
trans-unit.target: 本文档主要基于UCLA的出色资源http://www.ats.ucla.edu/stat/r/library/contrast_coding.htm

trans-unit.source: This does currently not distinguish between statistics that can be calculated from the original regression results and for which a leave-one-observation-out loop is needed
trans-unit.target: 目前,这并没有区分可以从原始回归结果中计算出来的统计量和需要留一观察值的循环的统计量

trans-unit.source: This example file shows how to use a few of the statsmodels regression diagnostic tests in a real-life context. You can learn about more tests and find out more information abou the tests here on the Regression Diagnostics page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例文件显示了如何在实际环境中使用一些 statsmodels 回归诊断测试。您可以在“ 回归诊断”页面上了解更多测试，并在测试中找到更多信息。

trans-unit.source: This example page shows how to use statsmodels' QuantReg class to replicate parts of the analysis published in
trans-unit.target: 此示例页面显示了如何使用 statsmodels 的 QuantReg 类来复制在

trans-unit.source: This example shows an example plot comparing significant differences in group means. Significant differences at the alpha=0.05 level can be identified by intervals that do not overlap (i.e. USA vs Japan, USA vs Germany).
trans-unit.target: 这个例子显示了一个比较各组平均值显著差异的图。在α=0.05水平上的显著差异可以通过不重叠的区间来确定(即美国对日本,美国对德国)。

trans-unit.source: This explanation of fmt is not complete, for an exhaustive specification see [1].
trans-unit.target: 关于 fmt 的解释还不完整，有关详细说明，请参见[1]。

trans-unit.source: This finds the ARMA(p,q) coefficients that minimize the integrated squared difference between the impulse_response functions (MA representation) of the AR and the ARMA process. This does not check whether the MA lag polynomial of the ARMA process is invertible, neither does it check the roots of the AR lag polynomial.
trans-unit.target: 这将找到ARMA(p,q)系数,使AR和ARMA过程的脉冲响应函数(MA表示)之间的积分平方差最小。它不检查ARMA过程的MA滞后多项式是否可逆,也不检查AR滞后多项式的根。

trans-unit.source: This first averages relevant variables for each time period over all individuals/groups, and then applies the same kernel weighted averaging over time as in HAC.
trans-unit.target: 首先对每个时间段所有个人/群体的相关变量进行平均,然后采用与HAC中相同的核加权平均。

trans-unit.source: This fit is computed by maximizing a log-likelihood function, with penalty applied for samples outside of range of the distribution. The returned answer is not guaranteed to be the globally optimal MLE, it may only be locally optimal, or the optimization may fail altogether.
trans-unit.target: 这个拟合度是通过最大化对数似然函数来计算的,对分布范围外的样本进行惩罚。返回的答案不保证是全局最优的MLE,它可能只是局部最优,或者优化可能完全失败。

trans-unit.source: This function assumes standardized scale, that is the variance in each dimension is one, but correlation can be arbitrary, covariance = correlation matrix
trans-unit.target: 该函数假设标准尺度,即每个维度的方差为1,但相关性可以是任意的,协方差=相关矩阵

trans-unit.source: This function by default does not compute variables required for smoothing.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数默认不计算平滑所需的变量。

trans-unit.source: This function calculates the family-specific ELBO function based on information provided from a subclass.
trans-unit.target: 该函数根据子类提供的信息计算特定家族的ELBO函数。

trans-unit.source: This function clips the eigenvalues, replacing eigenvalues smaller than the threshold by the threshold. The new matrix is normalized, so that the diagonal elements are one. Compared to corr_nearest, the distance between the original correlation matrix and the positive definite correlation matrix is larger, however, it is much faster since it only computes eigenvalues once.
trans-unit.target: 该函数对特征值进行剪辑,用阈值代替小于阈值的特征值。新矩阵经过归一化处理,使对角线元素为一。与corr_nearest相比,原始相关矩阵和正定相关矩阵之间的距离更大,但是,由于只计算一次特征值,所以速度更快。

trans-unit.source: This function does not convert subclasses of ndarrays. This requires that division is defined elementwise. np.ma.array and np.matrix are allowed.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数不转换ndarrays的子类。允许使用np.ma.array和np.matrix。

trans-unit.source: This function does not convert subclasses of ndarrays. This requires that multiplication is defined elementwise. np.ma.array are allowed, but not matrices.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数不转换ndarrays的子类。允许使用np.ma.array,但不允许使用matrices。

trans-unit.source: This function does not save the auxiliary regression.
trans-unit.target: 此功能不保存辅助回归。

trans-unit.source: This function exploits the factor structure for efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 该函数利用因子结构提高效率。

trans-unit.source: This function fits the analysis model and returns its parameter estimate. The parameter vector is not stored by the class and is not used in any subsequent calls to combine. Use fit to run all MICE steps together and obtain summary results.
trans-unit.target: 此函数适合分析模型并返回其参数估计值。参数向量不是由类和存储在任何后续调用不被用于 combine 。使用 fit 来一起运行所有MICE步骤并获得摘要结果。

trans-unit.source: This function is just an alias for scipy.stats.norm.cdf
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只是scipy.stats.norm.cdf的别名。

trans-unit.source: This function is just an alias for scipy.stats.norm.pdf
trans-unit.target: 这个函数只是scipy.stats.norm.pdf的别名。

trans-unit.source: This function normalizes the location and scale of the multivariate normal distribution and then uses mvstdnormcdf to call the integration.
trans-unit.target: 此函数将多元正态分布的位置和范围归一化，然后使用 mvstdnormcdf 调用积分。

trans-unit.source: This function provides a similar interface to chisquare tests as prop.test in R, however without the option for Yates continuity correction.
trans-unit.target: 该函数提供类似的接口，以卡方测试作为 prop.test 在R，但是没有对叶慈校正连续性的选项。

trans-unit.source: This function returns currently all results, but maybe we drop sigma and phi from the returns.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数返回目前所有的结果,但也许我们可以从返回中去掉sigma和phi。

trans-unit.source: This function uses brentq to find the value of beta where test_beta([beta], param_num)[1] is equal to the critical value.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数使用brentq来寻找beta值,其中test_beta([beta],param_num)[1]等于临界值。

trans-unit.source: This function uses the groups argument to determine groups within which observations may be dependent. The covariance matrix is calculated using the Huber-White “sandwich” approach.
trans-unit.target: 此函数使用 groups 参数确定观察可能依赖的组。使用Huber-White“三明治”方法计算协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: This generic form encapsulates many of the most popular linear time series models (see below) and is very flexible, allowing estimation with missing observations, forecasting, impulse response functions, and much more.
trans-unit.target: 这种通用形式封装了许多最流行的线性时间序列模型(见下文),并且非常灵活,允许在缺失观测值的情况下进行估计、预测、脉冲响应函数等。

trans-unit.source: This gives a similar comparison for when it is 0 vs not.
trans-unit.target: 这就给出了一个类似的比较,当它是0与不是。

trans-unit.source: This gives the following form for the process of the data:
trans-unit.target: 这样一来,数据的处理就有了以下形式。

trans-unit.source: This group of test whether the regression residuals are not autocorrelated. They assume that observations are ordered by time.
trans-unit.target: 这组检验回归残差是否不自相关。它们假设观测值是按时间排序的。

trans-unit.source: This has not been verified against a reference implementation. In a short Monte Carlo simulation where both samples are normally distribute, the test seems to be correctly sized for larger number of observations (30 or larger), but conservative (i.e. reject less often than nominal) with a sample size of 10 in each group.
trans-unit.target: 这一点还没有经过参考实施的验证。在一个简短的Monte Carlo模拟中,两个样本都是正态分布的,对于较多的观察值(30个或更多),测试的大小似乎是正确的,但保守的(即拒绝的次数比名义上的少),每组的样本大小为10。

trans-unit.source: This has since (02/11/16) been corrected, however the series could also be constructed by hand from HMRMT and CMRMT, as shown below (process taken from the notes in the Alfred xls file).
trans-unit.target: 此后(02/11/16)已被纠正,但该系列也可由HMRMT和CMRMT手工构建,如下图所示(过程取自Alfred xls文件中的注释)。

trans-unit.source: This ia naive implementation that does not exploit the block diagonal structure. It should work for ill-conditioned sigma but this is untested.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种不利用块对角线结构的简单实现。它应适用于条件差的 sigma ,但这未经测试。

trans-unit.source: This implementation currently only supports fully balanced designs. If the data contain more than one observation per subject and cell of the design, these observations need to be aggregated into a single observation before the Anova is calculated, either manually or by passing an aggregation function via the aggregate_func keyword argument. Note that if the input data set was not balanced before performing the aggregation, the implied heteroscedasticity of the data is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 此实现当前仅支持完全平衡的设计。如果数据在设计的每个主题和单元格中包含一个以上的观察值，则在手动计算方差分析或通过将聚合函数通过 aggregate_func 关键字参数传递聚合函数之前，需要将这些观察值汇总为一个观测值。请注意，如果在执行聚合之前输入数据集未达到平衡，则数据的隐含异方差性将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not take advantage of the symmetry of the Hessian and could probably be refactored for speed.
trans-unit.target: 这个实现没有利用Hessian的对称性,也许可以重构以提高速度。

trans-unit.source: This implements a Gram-Charlier expansion of the normal distribution where the first 2 moments coincide with those of the normal distribution but skew and kurtosis can deviate from it.
trans-unit.target: 这实现了正态分布的Gram-Charlier扩展,其中前2个矩与正态分布的矩重合,但偏度和峰度可以偏离它。

trans-unit.source: This indicates a lack of fit.
trans-unit.target: 这说明缺乏适合。

trans-unit.source: This is ‘mse_resid’ from each auxiliary regression.
trans-unit.target: 这是每个辅助回归中的“ mse_resid”。

trans-unit.source: This is -sum(log pdf(x, theta), axis=0) where theta are the parameters (including loc and scale).
trans-unit.target: 这是 -sum(log pdf(x, theta), axis=0) ，其中 theta 是参数（包括loc和scale）。

trans-unit.source: This is a bit of a trick, as the race category conveniently maps to zero-based indices. If it does not, this conversion happens under the hood, so this won’t work in general but nonetheless is a useful exercise to fix ideas. The below illustrates the output using the three contrasts above
trans-unit.target: 这是一个技巧，因为 race 类别方便地映射到从零开始的索引。如果不这样做，那么这种转换将在幕后进行，因此这通常不会起作用，但是仍然是固定想法的有用练习。下面说明了使用上面三个对比的输出

trans-unit.source: This is a bit of a trick, as the race category conveniently maps to zero-based indices. If it does not, this conversion happens under the hood, so this won't work in general but nonetheless is a useful exercise to fix ideas. The below illustrates the output using the three contrasts above
trans-unit.target: 这是一个技巧，因为 race 类别方便地映射到从零开始的索引。如果不这样做，那么这种转换将在幕后进行，因此这通常不会起作用，但是仍然是固定想法的有用练习。下面说明了使用上面三个对比的输出

trans-unit.source: This is a brief introduction notebook to VARMAX models in Statsmodels. The VARMAX model is generically specified as: $$ y_t = \nu + A_1 y_{t-1} + \dots + A_p y_{t-p} + B x_t + \epsilon_t + M_1 \epsilon_{t-1} + \dots M_q \epsilon_{t-q} $$
trans-unit.target: 这是Statsmodels中VARMAX模型的简单介绍笔记本。VARMAX模型一般指定为。$$ y_t=\nu+A_1 y_{t-1}+\dots+A_p y_{t-p}。+B x_t+epsilon_t+M_1 epsilon_{t-1}+\dots M_q epsilon_{t-q}$$

trans-unit.source: This is a class that shows that a new model can be defined by only specifying the method for the loglikelihood. All result statistics are inherited from the generic likelihood model and result classes. The results have been checked against R for a simple case.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个表明只需指定对数似然的方法就可以定义一个新模型的类。所有的结果统计都继承自通用似然模型和结果类。对于一个简单的案例,结果已经在R中进行了检查。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function that returns the standard errors for any covariance type.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个方便的函数,返回任何协方差类型的标准误差。

trans-unit.source: This is a convenience function that returns the standard errors for any covariance type. The value of bse is the standard errors for whichever covariance type is specified as an argument to fit (defaults to “robust”).
trans-unit.target: 这是一个便利函数，可返回任何协方差类型的标准误差。 bse 的值是将协方差类型指定为 fit 参数的标准误差（默认为“稳健”）。

trans-unit.source: This is a default implementation, it can be reimplemented in subclasses to optimize the linear algebra according to the struture of the covariance matrix.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个默认的实现,它可以在子类中重新实现,根据协方差矩阵的struture优化线性代数。

trans-unit.source: This is a full implementation of the holt winters exponential smoothing as per [1]. This includes all the unstable methods as well as the stable methods. The implementation of the library covers the functionality of the R library as much as possible whilst still being pythonic.
trans-unit.target: 这是根据[1]的霍尔特-温特斯指数平滑法的完整实现。这包括所有的不稳定方法以及稳定方法。该库的实现尽可能地覆盖了R库的功能,同时仍然是pythonic的。

trans-unit.source: This is a full implementation of the holts exponential smoothing as per [1].
trans-unit.target: 这是按[1]对holts指数平滑的完整实现。

trans-unit.source: This is a full implementation of the simple exponential smoothing as per [1].
trans-unit.target: 这是按[1]的简单指数平滑的完全实现。

trans-unit.source: This is a naive decomposition. More sophisticated methods should be preferred.
trans-unit.target: 这是一种天真的分解方法。应选择更复杂的方法。

trans-unit.source: This is a non-convex problem with no known gauranteed globally convergent algorithm for computing the solution. Borsdof, Higham and Raydan (2010) compared several methods for this problem and found the spectral projected gradient (SPG) method (used here) to perform best.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个非凸问题,没有已知的全球收敛算法来计算解。Borsdof、Higham和Raydan(2010年)比较了这一问题的几种方法,发现光谱投影梯度(SPG)方法(本文使用)表现最佳。

trans-unit.source: This is a noop in the base class, subclasses should override where appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 这是基类中的noop,子类应适当覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This is a numerical approximation using finite differences. Note that in general complex step methods cannot be used because it is not guaranteed that the transform_params method is a real function (e.g. if Cholesky decomposition is used).
trans-unit.target: 这是使用有限差分的数值近似。请注意，通常不能使用复杂的步骤方法，因为不能保证 transform_params 方法是实函数（例如，如果使用Cholesky分解）。

trans-unit.source: This is a numerical approximation, calculated using first-order complex step differentiation on the loglike method.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个数值近似值，是使用对数似 loglike 法使用一阶复数步阶微分计算得出的。

trans-unit.source: This is a numerical approximation, calculated using first-order complex step differentiation on the loglikeobs method.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个数值近似值，是使用 loglikeobs 方法使用一阶复杂阶跃微分来计算的。

trans-unit.source: This is a numerical approximation.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个数字上的近似值。

trans-unit.source: This is a placeholder intended to be overwritten by individual models.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个占位符,旨在被个别模型覆盖。

trans-unit.source: This is a special case of wald_test that always uses the F distribution.
trans-unit.target: 这是 wald_test 的特例，始终使用F分布。

trans-unit.source: This is a special case of Cochran’s Q test, and of the homogeneity test. The results when the chisquare distribution is used are identical, except for continuity correction.
trans-unit.target: 这是Cochran Q检验和同质性检验的特例。使用卡方分布时，除连续性校正外，结果相同。

trans-unit.source: This is a special case of Cochran’s Q test. The results when the chisquare distribution is used are identical, except for continuity correction.
trans-unit.target: 这是Cochran Q检验的特例。使用卡方分布时，除连续性校正外，结果相同。

trans-unit.source: This is a two-step process in which first the parameters are perturbed, then the missing values are re-imputed.
trans-unit.target: 这是一个两步走的过程,首先对参数进行扰动,然后重新计算缺失值。

trans-unit.source: This is currently for simple tree subset descend, similar to homogeneous_subsets, but checks all leave-one-out subsets instead of assuming an ordered set. Comment in SAS manual: SAS only uses interval subsets of the sorted list, which is sufficient for range tests (maybe also equal variance and balanced sample sizes are required). For F-test based critical distances, the restriction to intervals is not sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 这目前是针对简单的树子集降序,类似于homogeneous_subsets,但检查所有留一的子集,而不是假设一个有序的集合。SAS手册中的注释。SAS只使用排序列表的区间子集,这对于范围检验来说已经足够了(也许还需要等方差和平衡样本量)。对于基于F检验的临界距离,对区间的限制是不够的。

trans-unit.source: This is currently only available for t and z tests.

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to tentatively identify the order of an ARMA process, provided that the time series is stationary and invertible. This function computes the full exact MLE estimate of each model and can be, therefore a little slow. An implementation using approximate estimates will be provided in the future. In the meantime, consider passing {method : ‘css’} to fit_kw.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间序列是平稳且可逆的，则该方法可用于临时确定ARMA进程的顺序。此函数计算每个模型的完整MLE估计值，因此可能会有点慢。将来将提供使用近似估计的实现。同时，请考虑将{method：'css'}传递给fit_kw。

trans-unit.source: This method can only be used after the run method has been called. Returns estimates and standard errors of the analysis model parameters.
trans-unit.target: 仅在调用 run 方法之后才能使用此方法。返回分析模型参数的估计值和标准误差。

trans-unit.source: This method is from Harvey (1989), which shows that the information matrix only depends on terms from the gradient. This implementation is partially analytic and partially numeric approximation, therefore, because it uses the analytic formula for the information matrix, with numerically computed elements of the gradient.
trans-unit.target: 这种方法来自Harvey(1989),它表明信息矩阵只取决于梯度的项。因此,这种实施方法是部分分析和部分数字近似,因为它使用了信息矩阵的分析公式,而梯度的元素是通过数字计算的。

trans-unit.source: This method is not returning the same result as JMulTi. This is because the test is based on a VAR(k_ar) model in statsmodels (in accordance to pp. 104, 320-321 in [1]) whereas JMulTi seems to be using a VAR(k_ar+1) model. Reducing the lag order by one in JMulTi leads to equal results in statsmodels and JMulTi.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回的结果与 JMulTi 不同。这是因为测试是基于在VAR（k_ar）模型 statsmodels （按照到第104，320-321在[1] ），而 JMulTi 似乎使用VAR（k_ar + 1）模型。在 JMulTi 中将滞后阶数减一会导致 statsmodels 和 JMulTi 中的结果相等。

trans-unit.source: This method is not returning the same result as JMulTi. This is because the test is based on a VAR(k_ar) model in statsmodels (in accordance to pp. 104, 320-321 in [1]) whereas JMulTi seems to be using a VAR(k_ar+1) model.

trans-unit.source: This model applies the Kalman filter to compute recursive estimates of the coefficients and recursive residuals.
trans-unit.target: 该模型应用卡尔曼滤波器计算系数的递归估计和递归残差。

trans-unit.source: This model can be cast into state space form, and the unobserved factor estimated via the Kalman filter. The likelihood can be evaluated as a byproduct of the filtering recursions, and maximum likelihood estimation used to estimate the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 这个模型可以投射到状态空间的形式,并通过卡尔曼滤波器估计未观察到的因素。似然可以作为滤波递归的副产品进行评估,最大似然估计用于估计参数。

trans-unit.source: This model demonstrates estimation with regime heteroskedasticity (switching of variances) and no mean effect. The dataset can be reached at http://econ.korea.ac.kr/~cjkim/MARKOV/data/ew_excs.prn.

trans-unit.source: This notebook demonstrates applying these models to separate trend from cycle in the U.S. unemployment rate.
trans-unit.target: 本笔记本演示了应用这些模型来分离美国失业率的趋势和周期。

trans-unit.source: This notebook describes how to extend the Statsmodels statespace classes to create and estimate a custom model. Here we develop a local linear trend model.
trans-unit.target: 本笔记本介绍了如何扩展Statsmodels状态空间类来创建和估计一个自定义模型。在这里,我们开发了一个局部线性趋势模型。

trans-unit.source: This notebook illustrates how you can use R-style formulas to fit Generalized Linear Models.
trans-unit.target: 本笔记本说明了如何使用R式公式来拟合广义线性模型。

trans-unit.source: This notebook provides an example of the use of Markov switching models in Statsmodels to estimate dynamic regression models with changes in regime. It follows the examples in the Stata Markov switching documentation, which can be found at http://www.stata.com/manuals14/tsmswitch.pdf.
trans-unit.target: 该笔记本提供了在Statsmodels中使用Markov切换模型来估计随状态变化的动态回归模型的示例。它遵循Stata Markov交换文档中的示例，该文档可在http://www.stata.com/manuals14/tsmswitch.pdf上找到。

trans-unit.source: This notebook provides an example of the use of Markov switching models in Statsmodels to replicate a number of results presented in Kim and Nelson (1999). It applies the Hamilton (1989) filter the Kim (1994) smoother.
trans-unit.target: 本笔记本提供了一个在Statsmodels中使用Markov切换模型的例子,以复制Kim和Nelson(1999)中提出的一些结果。它应用了Hamilton(1989)过滤器和Kim(1994)平滑器。

trans-unit.source: This notebook replicates examples from the Stata ARIMA time series estimation and postestimation documentation.
trans-unit.target: 本笔记本复制了Stata ARIMA时间序列估计和后估计文档中的例子。

trans-unit.source: This notebook replicates the existing ARMA notebook using the statsmodels.tsa.statespace.SARIMAX class rather than the statsmodels.tsa.ARMA class.

trans-unit.source: This page lists issues which may arise while using statsmodels. These can be the result of data-related or statistical problems, software design, “non-standard” use of models, or edge cases.

trans-unit.source: This replicates Hamilton's (1989) seminal paper introducing Markov-switching models. The model is an autoregressive model of order 4 in which the mean of the process switches between two regimes. It can be written:

trans-unit.source: This returns a dummy variable for EVERY distinct variable. If a a structured or recarray is provided, the names for the new variable is the old variable name - underscore - category name. So if the a variable ‘vote’ had answers as ‘yes’ or ‘no’ then the returned array would have to new variables– ‘vote_yes’ and ‘vote_no’. There is currently no name checking.
trans-unit.target: 这将为每个不同的变量返回一个虚拟变量。如果提供结构化或重新数组，则新变量的名称为旧变量名称-下划线-类别名称。因此，如果变量“ vote”的答案为“是”或“否”，则返回的数组将必须包含新变量-“ vote_yes”和“ vote_no”。当前没有名称检查。

trans-unit.source: This returns a generic RegressioResults instance as defined for the linear models.
trans-unit.target: 这将返回一个为线性模型定义的通用RegressioResults实例。

trans-unit.source: This routine is useful if one has an estimated covariance matrix that is not SPD, and the ultimate goal is to estimate the inverse, square root, or inverse square root of the true covariance matrix. The factor structure allows these tasks to be performed without constructing any n x n matrices.
trans-unit.target: 如果有一个估计的协方差矩阵不是SPD,并且最终目标是估计真协方差矩阵的反、平方根或反平方根,那么这个例程就很有用。因子结构允许在不构建任何n×n矩阵的情况下执行这些任务。

trans-unit.source: This routine is useful when one has an approximate correlation matrix that is not positive semidefinite, and there is need to estimate the inverse, square root, or inverse square root of the population correlation matrix. The factor structure allows these tasks to be done without constructing any n x n matrices.
trans-unit.target: 当人们有一个非正半定型的近似相关矩阵,并且需要估计人口相关矩阵的反、平方根或反平方根时,这个例程非常有用。因子结构允许在不构建任何n×n矩阵的情况下完成这些任务。

trans-unit.source: This sandbox contains code that is for various resons not ready to be included in statsmodels proper. It contains modules from the old stats.models code that have not been tested, verified and updated to the new statsmodels structure: cox survival model, mixed effects model with repeated measures, generalized additive model and the formula framework. The sandbox also contains code that is currently being worked on until it fits the pattern of statsmodels or is sufficiently tested.
trans-unit.target: 这个沙盒包含了各种还没有准备好纳入 statsmodels 中的代码,它包含了旧的 stats.models 代码中的模块,这些模块还没有被测试、验证和更新到新的 statsmodels 结构中。它包含了旧的 stats.models 代码中尚未经过测试、验证和更新以适应新的 statsmodels 结构的模块:cox 生存模型、重复测量的混合效应模型、广义加成模型和公式框架。沙盒中还包含了目前正在研究的代码,直到它符合statsmodels的模式或经过充分的测试。

trans-unit.source: This section collects various additional functions and methods for statistical distributions.
trans-unit.target: 本节收集了统计分布的各种附加函数和方法。

trans-unit.source: This section collects various methods in nonparametric statistics. This includes kernel density estimation for univariate and multivariate data, kernel regression and locally weighted scatterplot smoothing (lowess).
trans-unit.target: 本节收集了非参数统计中的各种方法,包括单变量和多变量数据的核密度估计、核回归和局部加权散点平滑(lowess)。其中包括单变量和多变量数据的核密度估计、核回归和局部加权散点图平滑(lowess)。

trans-unit.source: This section collects various statistical tests and tools. Some can be used independently of any models, some are intended as extension to the models and model results.
trans-unit.target: 本节收集了各种统计测试和工具。有些可以独立于任何模型使用,有些是作为模型和模型结果的扩展。

trans-unit.source: This section includes methods and algorithms from multivariate statistics.
trans-unit.target: 本节包括多变量统计的方法和算法。

trans-unit.source: This should be extended once I figure out what the distribution of runs of any length k is.
trans-unit.target: 一旦我弄清楚任何长度k的运行的分布是什么,这应该扩展。

trans-unit.source: This should be extended to general least squares.
trans-unit.target: 这应该推广到一般最小二乘法。

trans-unit.source: This solves a separate OLS estimation for each desired lag.
trans-unit.target: 这就解决了每个所需滞后的单独OLS估计。

trans-unit.source: This solves yule_walker equations or ols for each desired lag and contains currently duplicate calculations.
trans-unit.target: 这将为每个所需的滞后解决yule_walker方程或OLS,并包含当前重复的计算。

trans-unit.source: This solves yule_walker for each desired lag and contains currently duplicate calculations.
trans-unit.target: 这将解决yule_walker的每个所需的滞后,并包含当前重复的计算。

trans-unit.target: 这个规范嵌套了很多简单的规范。例如,带有AR(2)误差的回归是:

trans-unit.source: This specifies the alternative hypothesis for the test that corresponds to the confidence interval. The alternative hypothesis, H1, has to be one of the following
trans-unit.target: 这指定了与置信区间相对应的检验的替代假设。备选假设 H1 必须是下列之一

trans-unit.source: This specifies the alternative hypothesis for the test that corresponds to the confidence interval. The alternative hypothesis, H1, has to be one of the following :
trans-unit.target: 这指定了与置信区间相对应的检验的替代假设。备选假设H1必须是以下之一。

trans-unit.source: This statistic can be tested against an \(F(h,h)\) distribution. Alternatively, \(h H(h)\) is asymptotically distributed according to \(\chi_h^2\); this second test can be applied by passing asymptotic=True as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 可以针对\（F（h，h）\）分布测试此统计信息。或者，根据（（chi_h ^ 2 \）渐近分布\（h H（h）\）; 可以通过传递 asymptotic=True 作为参数来应用第二个测试。

trans-unit.source: This test can also be used for a paired t-test, where effect size is defined in terms of the mean difference, and nobs is the number of pairs.
trans-unit.target: 该检验也可用于配对t检验,其中效应大小用均值差来定义,nobs为配对数。

trans-unit.source: This test compares the loglikelihood of the two models. This may not be a valid test, if there is unspecified heteroscedasticity or correlation. This method will issue a warning if this is detected but still return the results without taking unspecified heteroscedasticity or correlation into account.
trans-unit.target: 这个测试比较了两个模型的对数似然性。如果存在未指定的异方差性或相关性,这可能不是一个有效的测试。如果检测到这种情况,本方法将发出警告,但仍然返回结果,而不考虑未指定的异方差性或相关性。

trans-unit.source: This test compares the residual sum of squares of the two models. This is not a valid test, if there is unspecified heteroscedasticity or correlation. This method will issue a warning if this is detected but still return the results under the assumption of homoscedasticity and no autocorrelation (sphericity).
trans-unit.target: 该检验比较两个模型的残差平方和。如果存在未指定的异方差性或相关性,这不是一个有效的测试。如果检测到这种情况,本方法将发出警告,但在假设有同质性和无自相关性(球形性)的情况下,仍然返回结果。

trans-unit.source: This test is a t-test that the mean of the recursive ols residuals is zero. Calculating the recursive residuals might take some time for large samples.
trans-unit.target: 这个检验是一个t检验,即递归OLS残差的平均值为零。对于大样本,计算递归残差可能需要一些时间。

trans-unit.source: This test is described in [1], chapter 8.4.1.
trans-unit.target: 此测试在[1]的 8.4.1章中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: This test is intended for continuous distributions SAS has treatment for ties, but not clear, and sounds more complicated (minimum and maximum possible runs prevent use of argsort) (maybe it’s not so difficult, idea: add small positive noise to first one, run test, then to the other, run test, take max(?) p-value - DONE This gives not the minimum and maximum of the number of runs, but should be close. Not true, this is close to minimum but far away from maximum. maximum number of runs would use alternating groups in the ties.) Maybe adding random noise would be the better approach.
trans-unit.target: 该测试旨在用于连续分布SAS对纽带进行了处理，但不清楚，而且听起来更复杂（最小和最大可能运行防止使用argsort）（也许并不那么困难，想法：在第一个运行时添加小的正噪声，运行测试，然后进行另一个测试，取max（？）p值-DONE这没有给出最小和最大的运行次数，但是应该接近。不正确，这接近最小值，但距离很远可能会增加平局中的交替组。）也许添加随机噪声会是更好的方法。

trans-unit.source: This test is often used as a residual diagnostic.
trans-unit.target: 此项检查常作为一种残留诊断。

trans-unit.source: This test works also for multi-endpoint comparisons: If d1 and d2 have the same number of columns, then each column of the data in d1 is compared with the corresponding column in d2. This is the same as comparing each of the corresponding columns separately. Currently no multi-comparison correction is used. The raw p-values reported here can be correction with the functions in multitest.
trans-unit.target: 该测试还适用于多端点比较：如果d1和d2具有相同的列数，则将d1中数据的每一列与d2中的对应列进行比较。这与分别比较每个对应的列相同。当前，没有使用多重比较校正。此处报告的原始p值可以使用 multitest 中的函数进行校正。

trans-unit.source: This tests that each coefficient is jointly statistically significantly different from zero.
trans-unit.target: 这就检验了每个系数与零的共同统计显著性。

trans-unit.source: This tests that the coefficient on the 2nd and 3rd regressors are equal and jointly that the coefficient on the 5th and 6th regressors are equal.
trans-unit.target: 这就检验了第2和第3个回归者的系数是相等的,共同检验了第5和第6个回归者的系数是相等的。

trans-unit.source: This tests whether all groups have the same fraction of observations above the median.
trans-unit.target: 这检验了是否所有组的观测值在中位数以上的比例相同。

trans-unit.source: This tests whether two samples come from the same distribution.
trans-unit.target: 这测试了两个样本是否来自同一个分布。

trans-unit.source: This tutorial explains how to quickly implement new maximum likelihood models in statsmodels. We give two examples:
trans-unit.target: 本教程介绍了如何在 statsmodels 中快速实现新的最大似然模型。我们举两个例子：

trans-unit.source: This uses numpy.asarray to convert the input, in contrast to the other functions in this category.
trans-unit.target: 与该类别中的其他函数相比，它使用 numpy.asarray 来转换输入。

trans-unit.source: This uses a more numerically accurate calculation if available.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话,这将使用更精确的数字计算。

trans-unit.source: This uses a simple normal test for proportions. It should be the same as running the mean z-test on the data encoded 1 for event and 0 for no event so that the sum corresponds to the count.
trans-unit.target: 这使用一个简单的正态检验的比例。它应该和对编码为1的事件和编码为0的无事件的数据进行平均z检验一样,使总和与计数相对应。

trans-unit.source: This uses determinant of the estimate of the parameter covariance from leave-one-out estimates. requires leave one out loop for observations
trans-unit.target: 这使用了留一输出估计的参数协方差估计的决定因素。 需要对观测值留一输出循环

trans-unit.source: This uses np.correlate which does full convolution. For very long time series it is recommended to use fft convolution instead.
trans-unit.target: 它使用的是np.cor correlate,它可以进行完全卷积。对于非常长的时间序列,建议使用 fft 卷积。

trans-unit.source: This uses scipy.stats.binom_test for the two-sided alternative.
trans-unit.target: 这使用scipy.stats.binom_test来进行双面替代。

trans-unit.source: This uses signal.freqz, which does not use fft. There is a fft version somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 它使用signal.freqz,而不是使用fft。某处有一个fft版本。

trans-unit.source: This uses the augmented Engle-Granger two-step cointegration test. Constant or trend is included in 1st stage regression, i.e. in cointegrating equation.
trans-unit.target: 这使用了增强的Engle-Granger两步协整检验。常数或趋势被纳入第一阶段回归,即纳入共融方程。

trans-unit.source: This uses the formula design_info encoding contrast matrix and should work for all encodings of a main effect.
trans-unit.target: 这使用公式design_info编码对比度矩阵,应该适用于主效果的所有编码。

trans-unit.source: This uses the same degrees of freedom correction as the t-test in the calculation of the standard error of the mean, i.e it uses (sum_weights - 1) instead of sum_weights in the denominator. See Examples below for the difference.
trans-unit.target: 在计算平均值的标准误差时，它使用与t检验相同的自由度校正，即它使用 (sum_weights - 1) 代替分母中的 sum_weights 。有关差异，请参见下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: This version uses a single critical value of the studentized range distribution for all comparisons, and is therefore a step-down version of Tukey HSD. The class is written so it can be subclassed, where the get_distance_matrix and get_crit are overwritten to obtain other step-down procedures such as REGW.
trans-unit.target: 这个版本在所有的比较中使用一个studentized range分布的临界值,因此是Tukey HSD的降级版本。该类的编写使其可以被子类化,其中get_distance_matrix和get_crit被覆盖以获得其他降级程序,如REGW。

trans-unit.source: To compute the quantiles, first, the weights are summed over exact ties yielding distinct data values y_1 < y_2 < …, and corresponding weights w_1, w_2, …. Let s_j denote the sum of the first j weights, and let W denote the sum of all the weights. For a probability point p, if pW falls strictly between s_j and s_{j+1} then the estimated quantile is y_{j+1}. If pW = s_j then the estimated quantile is (y_j + y_{j+1})/2. If pW < p_1 then the estimated quantile is y_1.
trans-unit.target: 为了计算分位数，首先，将权重在精确联系上求和，得出不同的数据值y_1 <y_2 <…，以及相应的权重w_1，w_2，...。令s_j表示前j个权重的总和，令W表示所有权重的总和。对于概率点p，如果pW严格落在s_j和s_ {j + 1}之间，则估计分位数为y_ {j + 1}。如果pW = s_j，则估计分位数为（y_j + y_ {j + 1}）/ 2。如果pW <p_1，则估计的分位数为y_1。

trans-unit.source: To estimate sigma^2 the Newey-West estimator is used. If lags is None, the truncation lag parameter is set to int(12 * (n / 100) ** (1 / 4)), as outlined in Schwert (1989). The p-values are interpolated from Table 1 of Kwiatkowski et al. (1992). If the computed statistic is outside the table of critical values, then a warning message is generated.
trans-unit.target: 为了估计sigma^2,使用Newey-West估计器。如果滞后为无,则截断滞后参数设置为int(12*(n/100)**(1/4)),如Schwert(1989)所述。p值是从Kwiatkowski等人(1992)的表1中插值而来。如果计算出的统计量在临界值表之外,则会产生一条警告信息。

trans-unit.source: To obtain the crude (global) odds ratio, first pool all binary indicators corresponding to a given pair of cut points (c,c’), then calculate the odds ratio for this 2x2 table. The crude odds ratio is the inverse variance weighted average of these odds ratios. Since the covariate effects are ignored, this OR will generally be greater than the stratified OR.
trans-unit.target: 要获得粗略的（全局）优势比，请首先汇总与给定一对切点（c，c'）相对应的所有二进制指标，然后为该2x2表计算优势比。原始优势比是这些优势比的逆方差加权平均值。由于忽略了协变量效应，因此该OR通常会大于分层OR。

trans-unit.source: Univariate distributions can be generated from a non-linear transformation of an existing univariate distribution. Transf_gen is a class that can generate a new distribution from a monotonic transformation, TransfTwo_gen can use hump-shaped or u-shaped transformation, such as abs or square. The remaining objects are special cases.
trans-unit.target: 可以从现有单变量分布的非线性变换中生成单变量分布。 Transf_gen 是可以从单调变换生成新分布的类， TransfTwo_gen 可以使用驼峰形或u形变换，例如abs或square。其余对象是特殊情况。

trans-unit.source: Univariate estimation (as provided by KDEUnivariate) uses FFT transforms, which makes it quite fast. Therefore it should be preferred for continuous, univariate data if speed is important. It supports using different kernels; bandwidth estimation is done only by a rule of thumb (Scott or Silverman).
trans-unit.target: 单变量估计（由 KDEUnivariate 提供）使用FFT变换，这使其速度非常快。因此，如果速度很重要，则对于连续的单变量数据，它应该是首选。它支持使用不同的内核。带宽估计只能通过经验法则（Scott或Silverman）来完成。

trans-unit.target: 未知变更点

trans-unit.source: Unlike Statsmodels mixed linear models, the GLIMMIX implementation is not group-based. Groups are created by interacting all random effects with a categorical variable. Note that this creates large, sparse random effects design matrices exog_vc. Internally, exog_vc is converted to a scipy sparse matrix. When passing the arguments directly to the class initializer, a sparse matrix may be passed. When using formulas, a dense matrix is created then converted to sparse. For very large problems, it may not be feasible to use formulas due to the size of this dense intermediate matrix.
trans-unit.target: 与Statsmodels混合线性模型不同，GLIMMIX实现不是基于组的。通过将所有随机效果与分类变量进行交互来创建组。请注意，这会创建大型的稀疏随机效果设计矩阵 exog_vc 。在内部， exog_vc 转换为稀疏矩阵。当将参数直接传递给类初始化程序时，可能会传递一个稀疏矩阵。使用公式时，将创建一个密集矩阵，然后将其转换为稀疏矩阵。对于非常大的问题，由于该密集中间矩阵的大小，使用公式可能不可行。

trans-unit.target: 更新过滤结果

trans-unit.target: 更新模型的参数

trans-unit.source: Update the smoother results
trans-unit.target: 更新更平滑的结果

trans-unit.source: Updates the association parameter values based on the current regression coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 根据当前的回归系数更新关联参数值。

trans-unit.source: Updates the representation matrices to fill in the new parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 更新表示矩阵以填充新的参数值。

trans-unit.source: Usage Example
trans-unit.target: 使用实例

trans-unit.source: Use GLS to update the fixed effects parameter estimates.
trans-unit.target: 使用GLS更新固定效应参数估计值。

trans-unit.source: Use Lagrange Multiplier test to test whether restricted model is correct
trans-unit.target: 用拉格朗日乘法器检验限制性模型是否正确。

trans-unit.source: Use a Cholesky decomposition along with a linear solver.
trans-unit.target: 使用Cholesky分解以及线性求解器。

trans-unit.source: Use a Gaussian null distribution estimated from the data:
trans-unit.target: 使用从数据中估计的高斯空分布。

trans-unit.source: Use an Cholesky decomposition along with typical matrix inversion.
trans-unit.target: 使用Cholesky分解以及典型的矩阵反演。

trans-unit.source: Use an LU decomposition along with a linear solver (rather than ever actually inverting the matrix).
trans-unit.target: 使用LU分解以及线性求解器(而不是真正地对矩阵进行反演)。

trans-unit.source: Use an LU decomposition along with typical matrix inversion.
trans-unit.target: 使用LU分解以及典型的矩阵反演。

trans-unit.source: Use formulas to fit a Poisson GLM with independent working dependence:
trans-unit.target: 使用公式拟合具有独立工作依赖性的泊松GLM。

trans-unit.source: Use predictive mean matching to impute missing values.
trans-unit.target: 使用预测均值匹配来推算缺失值。

trans-unit.source: Use the results predict method instead.
trans-unit.target: 用结果预测法代替。

trans-unit.source: Used bandwidth is self.bw.
trans-unit.target: 使用的带宽是 self.bw 。

trans-unit.source: Used primarily to enforce stationarity of the autoregressive lag polynomial, invertibility of the moving average lag polynomial, and positive variance parameters.
trans-unit.target: 主要用于强制执行自回归滞后多项式的静止性、移动平均滞后多项式的可逆性和正方差参数。

trans-unit.source: Used primarily to reverse enforcement of stationarity of the autoregressive lag polynomial and invertibility of the moving average lag polynomial.
trans-unit.target: 主要用于反向执行自回归滞后多项式的静止性和移动平均滞后多项式的反向性。

trans-unit.source: Used to calculate leverages and score residuals.
trans-unit.target: 用于计算杠杆率和得分残差。

trans-unit.source: Used to estimate the robust covariance matrix.
trans-unit.target: 用于估计稳健协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Useful information on leverage can also be plotted:
trans-unit.target: 杠杆率的有用信息也可以绘制出来。

trans-unit.source: User Notes
trans-unit.target: 用户须知

trans-unit.source: Users can also leverage the powerful input/output functions provided by pandas.io. Among other things, pandas (a statsmodels dependency) allows reading and writing to Excel, CSV, and HDF5 (PyTables).
trans-unit.target: 用户还可以利用pandas.io提供的强大的输入/输出功能。除其他事项外， pandas （一种 statsmodels 依赖项）允许对Excel，CSV和HDF5（PyTables）进行读写。

trans-unit.source: Users do not need to load the subpackage/api.py modules directly.
trans-unit.target: 用户不需要直接加载 subpackage/api.py 模块。

trans-unit.source: Uses closed form expression instead of nonlinear optimizers
trans-unit.target: 使用闭式表达式代替非线性优化器。

trans-unit.source: Uses closed form expression instead of nonlinear optimizers for each step of the iterative GMM.
trans-unit.target: 在迭代GMM的每一步中使用闭式表达式代替非线性优化器。

trans-unit.source: Uses proportionate first-differences as the penalty function. See notes.
trans-unit.target: 使用比例初差作为惩罚函数。见注释。

trans-unit.source: Uses the Nelson-Aalen estimator.
trans-unit.target: 使用Nelson-Aalen估计器。

trans-unit.source: Uses the list representation internally, even if an array is passed.
trans-unit.target: 即使传递了一个数组,也会在内部使用列表表示。

trans-unit.source: Using Formulas with GLMs
trans-unit.target: 使用公式与GLMs

trans-unit.source: Using Lütkepohl (2005) notation
trans-unit.target: 使用Lütkepohl（2005）表示法

trans-unit.source: Using Pandas
trans-unit.target: 使用潘达斯

trans-unit.source: Using a DataFrame as source, specifying the name of the columns of interest >>> gender = [‘male’, ‘male’, ‘male’, ‘female’, ‘female’, ‘female’] >>> pet = [‘cat’, ‘dog’, ‘dog’, ‘cat’, ‘dog’, ‘cat’] >>> data = pandas.DataFrame({‘gender’: gender, ‘pet’: pet}) >>> mosaic(data, [‘pet’, ‘gender’]) >>> pylab.show()
trans-unit.target: 使用DataFrame作为源，指定感兴趣的列的名称>>>性别= [''male'，'male'，'male'，'female'，'female'，'female'] >>> pet = [ 'cat'，'dog'，'dog'，'cat'，'dog'，'cat'] >>> data = pandas.DataFrame（{'gender'：性别，'pet'：pet}）>>>镶嵌（data，['pet'，'gender']）>>> pylab.show（）

trans-unit.source: Using a kernel smoothing technique, the probability density function (PDF) of the multivariate space can be recovered. From this PDF, it is possible to compute the density probability linked to the cluster of points and plot its contours.
trans-unit.target: 利用核平滑技术,可以恢复多变量空间的概率密度函数(PDF)。从这个PDF中,可以计算出与点群相关联的密度概率,并绘制出其轮廓。

trans-unit.source: Using a linear solver rather than true matrix inversion is generally faster and is numerically more stable.
trans-unit.target: 使用线性求解器而不是真正的矩阵反演,一般来说速度更快,数值上更稳定。

trans-unit.source: Using explicit dates
trans-unit.target: 使用明确的日期

trans-unit.source: Using formulas can make both estimation and prediction a lot easier
trans-unit.target: 使用公式可以使估计和预测都变得更容易。

trans-unit.source: Using formulas with models that do not (yet) support them
trans-unit.target: 使用尚不支持的模型的公式。

trans-unit.source: Using log(V) as the offset is equivalent to using V as the exposure. If exposure U and offset V are both provided, then log(U) + V is added to the linear predictor.
trans-unit.target: 使用log(V)作为偏移量相当于使用V作为曝光量。如果同时提供了曝光量U和偏移量V,那么log(U)+V将被添加到线性预测器中。

trans-unit.source: Using robust regression to correct for outliers.
trans-unit.target: 使用稳健回归来纠正异常值。

trans-unit.source: Using setuptools
trans-unit.target: 使用setuptools

trans-unit.source: Using the nbinom distribution from scipy, we can write this likelihood simply as:
trans-unit.target: 使用 nbinom 从分布 scipy ，我们可以简单的写这个可能性为：

trans-unit.source: Using the ARMA(1,1) specification selected above, we perform in-sample prediction and out-of-sample forecasting.
trans-unit.target: 利用上面选择的ARMA(1,1)规范,我们进行样本内预测和样本外预测。

trans-unit.source: Using the LOO measures is currently only recommended if the data set is not too large. One possible approach for LOOO measures would be to identify possible problem observations with the _internal measures, and then run the leave-one-observation-out only with observations that are possible outliers. (However, this is not yet available in an automized way.)
trans-unit.target: 目前只有在数据集不是太大的情况下,才建议使用LOOO措施。LOOO措施的一种可能的方法是用_内部措施识别可能的问题观测值,然后只对可能是离群值的观测值运行留一观测值出。(然而,这还没有自动化的方式。)

trans-unit.source: Using the default row and column scores gives the Cochran-Armitage trend test.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的行和列得分,可以得到Cochran-Armitage趋势检验。

trans-unit.source: Using the time-varying transition probabilities, we can see how the expected duration of a low-production state changes over time:
trans-unit.target: 利用时间变化的过渡概率,我们可以看到低产状态的预期持续时间如何随时间变化。

trans-unit.source: Using this simple model, we can estimate the parameters from a local linear trend model. The following example is from Commandeur and Koopman (2007), section 3.4., modeling motor vehicle fatalities in Finland.
trans-unit.target: 利用这个简单的模型,我们可以从局部线性趋势模型中估计参数。下面的例子来自Commandeur和Koopman(2007),第3.4节,对芬兰的机动车死亡事件进行建模。
